trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access a delegate across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un contratto che i componenti possono utilizzare per accedere a un delegato superando i limiti di domini applicazione e processi.

trans-unit.source: To invoke a delegate, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiamare un delegato, utilizzare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to an event or remove a delegate from an event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that is returned by <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un delegato a un evento o rimuovere un delegato da un evento, chiamare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> metodo il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> restituito da <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate to the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passare un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> che rappresenta il delegato per il `parameters` parametro di <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the delegate parameters.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> che specifica i parametri del delegato.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the delegate that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract" /> identifies.
A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the return value of the invoked delegate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> che specifica il valore restituito del delegato richiamato.
